title: Beauty and the Beast
short_plot_summary: A beautiful young woman, called Beauty, sacrifices her own freedom by living with a fearsome Beast in his enchanted castle in order to save her father. Over time, she discovers the Beast's kind heart and they fall in love, breaking the curse and transforming him back into a prince.
explanation: A princess, representing Beauty, the main character and protagonist of the story
A lion, symbolizing the Beast, who is feared and misunderstood due to his appearance
A rose, illustrating the magical element of the story and the enchanted rose that the Beast's curse is tied to
A castle, signifying the enchanted castle where Beauty and the Beast reside during the story
Two intertwined hearts, representing the love and understanding that grows between Beauty and the Beast, breaking the curse
